A smart keychain that connects to your phone via Bluetooth, allowing you to track your keys and receive notifications when they are out of range.
A keychain with a built-in flashlight, perfect for finding your keys in the dark.
A keychain with a hidden compartment for storing small valuables, such as cash or a small USB drive.
A keychain with a built-in bottle opener, making it easy to open your favorite beverage.
A keychain with a built-in compass, helping you navigate your way anywhere.
